insert into student
id,
name,
age,
classId,
createdTime,
detail,

mapper.update:
update student
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
classId = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdTime = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update student set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, classId = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdTime = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
